name: ai-catalog-saas
description: SaaS platform for AI software vendors to sell projects to banks and insurance companies

scripts.dev:reset: npm run reset:db && concurrently "npm run server" "npm run client"
scripts.dev:help: echo "Available scripts: npm run dev, npm run server, npm run client, npm run build"
scripts.client: cd client && PORT=3001 REACT_APP_CLEAN_OUTPUT=true npm start
scripts.build: cd client && npm install && npm run build
scripts.install-all: npm install && cd client && npm install
scripts.test:client: cd client && PORT=3004 REACT_APP_BACKEND_PORT=5004 npm start
scripts.test:frontend: cd client && PORT=3004 REACT_APP_BACKEND_PORT=5004 npm test
scripts.test:full: npm run reset:db && concurrently "npm run test:backend" "npm run test:frontend"
